page.title: 06LANDFILL AND WILDLIFE
page.content:
At the{CLEANAWAY SITE}there is lots of wildlife. They have SEAGULLS,BADGERS, MOLES,FOXES,HARES,RABBITS and lots more.To catch seagulls they have 4 canons attached to a net.They have{25 grams of gunpowder in it.When the seagulls are settled on the rubbish men fire the canon and the net goes up in the air and then falls down on the seagulls.They take the net off and put them in a sack.None of them are harmed or killed.They put rings on them and let them go.If they come back they look up the number and see if it has been before. Five nesting boxes for kestrels are also on the site. Seagulls have been found from the site in{RUSSIA}and other countries. Injured seagulls and animals are looked after at the site.
{ }
